sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-navigation-drawer
    app
    permanent
    :mini-variant.sync="mini"
    width="230"
    >
    <!-- :mini-variant.sync="toggleDrawer" -->
    <!-- v-model="toggleDrawer"    -->
    <v-list
      dense>
      <v-list-item class="px-0">
        <v-list-item-avatar class="ml-2" v-if="mini">
          <v-img 
            contain
            class="imgCursor"
            src="../assets/logoMiniHWL.png"
            >
          </v-img>          
        </v-list-item-avatar>
        <v-list-item-avatar class="ml-9" tile width="150" height="50" v-else>
          <v-img 
            contain
            src="../assets/logoHWL.png"
            >
          </v-img>          
        </v-list-item-avatar>

        <v-btn
          icon
          @click.stop="mini = !mini">
          <v-icon class="text-h6">mdi-chevron-left</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-list-item>
    </v-list>

    <!-- <v-divider></v-divider> -->

    <v-list
      nav 
      dense
      >
      <v-subheader 
        v-show="!mini"
        class="text-uppercase text-caption subheaderText">
        Overview
      </v-subheader>
      <v-list-group
        v-for="item in allGroupItems"
        :key="item.id"
        no-action
        class="iconMargin"
        append-icon
        :prepend-icon="item.icon">

          <template v-slot:activator>
            <v-list-item-title 
              class="font-weight-regular">
              {{ item.text }}
            </v-list-item-title>
          </template>
      </v-list-group>
      <!-- <v-list-item-group v-model="selectedItem" color="primary">
        <v-list-item>
          <v-list-item-icon>
            <v-icon>mdi-sigma</v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-title>All</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-item-group> -->

      <v-subheader 
        v-show="!mini"
        class="text-uppercase text-caption subheaderText">
        Sprzedaż
      </v-subheader>
      <v-list-group
        v-for="item in salesGroupItems"
        :key="item.id"
        no-action
        class="iconMargin"
        append-icon="mdi-chevron-down text-h6"
        :prepend-icon="item.icon">

          <template v-slot:activator>
            <v-list-item-title  
              class="font-weight-regular">
              {{ item.text}}
            </v-list-item-title>
          </template>

        <v-list-item
          v-for="item in salesSubgroupItems"
          :key="item.id"
          link
          class="pl-12">
            <v-list-item-icon class="mr-4">
              <v-icon> {{ item.icon }} </v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title class="font-weight-regular"> {{ item.text }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-group>  
      
      <v-subheader 
        v-show="!mini"
        class="text-uppercase text-caption subheaderText">
        Prowizje
      </v-subheader>
      <v-list-group
        v-for="item in commissionGroupItems"
        :key="item.id"
        no-action
        class="iconMargin"
        append-icon="mdi-chevron-down text-h6"
        :prepend-icon="item.icon">

          <template v-slot:activator>
            <v-list-item-title
              class="font-weight-regular">
              {{ item.text}}
            </v-list-item-title>
          </template>

        <v-list-item
          v-for="item in commissionSubgroupItems"
          :key="item.id"
          link
          class="pl-12">
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon> {{ item.icon }} </v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title> {{ item.text }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-group>        
    </v-list>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>

<script>
import { mapState } from 'vuex'

export default {
    data () {
      return {
        selectedItem: 0,
        mini: true,
        allGroupItems: [
          { id: 1,  text: "Global", icon: "mdi-sigma" },
        ],
        salesGroupItems: [
          { id: 1,  text: "AFR", icon: "mdi-airplane" },
          { id: 2, text: "SFR", icon: "mdi-ferry" },
          { id: 3, text: "TRNG", icon: "mdi-truck" },
          { id: 4, text: "TRIG", icon: "mdi-truck-fast" },
          { id: 5, text: "TRNF", icon: "mdi-truck-flatbed" },
          { id: 6, text: "CLC", icon: "mdi-warehouse" }
        ],
        salesSubgroupItems: [
          { id: 1.1,  text: "Przychody & GP", icon: "mdi-chart-timeline-variant-shimmer" },
          { id: 2.1, text: "Stats", icon: "mdi-calculator-variant-outline" }
        ],
        commissionGroupItems: [
          { id: 1,  text: "Wyniki", icon: "mdi-currency-usd" },
          { id: 2, text: "Przesyłki", icon: "mdi-package-variant" }
        ],
        commissionSubgroupItems: [
          { id: 1.1,  text: "Realizacja", icon: "mdi-chart-timeline-variant-shimmer" },
        ],
  }
},

computed: {
    // ...mapState('custom', ['toggleDrawer']),

    // toggleDrawer: {
    //     get() {
    //         return this.drawer
    //     },
    //     set(newVal) {
    //         this.$store.commit('custom/setDrawer', newVal)
    //     }
    // }
}
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.imgCursor {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.subheaderText {
  font-size: 11px !important;
}

.iconMargin >>> .v-list-item__icon.v-list-group__header__prepend-icon {
  margin-right: 20px;
}

</style>>
